name: Frozen Food
description:
Made in 10 days for Vimjam 3. Overall I procrastinated far too much and ended up making most of the game in one stressful day, so I am submitting a buggy mess of a project. I hope to re-visit the concept of this game later on under different circumstances.

You are the "chef" at a popular restaurant.

Unfortunately, you are the only one working tonight, and all the supplies are pre-made frozen foods.

Can you keep track of reheating and taking orders?
